import React from 'react'; import './Page.css'; import DisplayMedia from '../MediaDisplay/MediaDisplay'; import DisplayLinks from '../LinkList/LinkList'; const Page = ({ project, onClose }) => { return (

{project.title}

{"Role: "+ project.role}

{project.date} {project.company} {project.industry}

THE WHY
 {project.why}

{}

What
 {project.what}

{}

Impact
 {project.impact}

{}

Case Studies
 {}

Other Links
 {}

Frameworks
 {}

); }; export default Page;
